document.discussion_title: Betsy Davis, terminally ill woman holds 2 days party with friends, kills herself
document.topic_text: Link Ads: Meet The Top Website Designer In Nigeria Click Here Betsy Davis, terminally ill woman holds 2 days party with friends, kills herself Betsy Davis , 41, went down the history lane as the first Californian to take a lethal dose of drugs under California’s new doctor-assisted suicide law . Download MP3 Betsy , invited her closest friends and relatives to a two-day party, saying: ‘These circumstances are unlike any party you have attended before, requiring emotional stamina, centeredness and openness.’ She had one rule, which is No crying in front of her . She was an artist with Lou Gehrig’s disease and she held the mini party to say Goodbye. Davis worked out the precise hour she planned to slip into a coma, and shared her plans with her guests in the invitation.
